title: ‘I Don’t Understand Much About Cycling’: Visma-Lease a Bike Puts Faith in Swim Coach for Top Management
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike confirms Olympic swim guru Jacco Verhaeren will move to central leadership after exit of mastermind Tour de France director Merijn Zeeman.

Read the full article at ‘I Don’t Understand Much About Cycling’: Visma-Lease a Bike Puts Faith in Swim Coach for Top Management on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
